text: "Weekends" is a 2000 song by hip hop band Black Eyed Peas and is the second single from their second studio album Bridging the Gap. It went to number 93 in Australia, number 100 in Germany and number 34 on the Billboard Hot Rap Songs charts. The intro samples the 1971 song Family Affair by Sly and the Family Stone. ==Track listings and formats== ; Australian maxi CD single # "Weekends" - 4:47 # "Empire Strikes Black" - 3:53 # "Magic" - 3:58 # "Joints & Jam" (The Billion Mix) - 3:23 # "Weekends" (live) - 5:43 # "BEP Empire" (music video) ; European maxi CD single # "Weekends" - 4:47 # "Empire Strikes Black" - 3:53 # "Magic" - 3:58 # "BEP Empire" (music video) Category:2000 songs Category:Black Eyed Peas songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Funk songs
title: Weekends (Black Eyed Peas song)
